## ✅ Expected behavior
> How was it supposed to work?

## 📸 Screenshot or log (optional)

## 🔧 Task checklist
- [ ] Determine the cause
- [ ] Write corrective code
- [ ] Complete local testing
- [ ] Create relevant PRs
